mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_client_rag_order (rag_id, rag_name, knowledge_tag, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{ragId}, #{ragName}, #{knowledgeTag}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, rag_id, rag_name, knowledge_tag, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client_rag_order ORDER BY id
